items.sentence: The pond has frozen, so we can now go ice skating.
Why do you keep saying things that you don't mean?
Tom knew Mary would never go to Boston by herself.
Tom was too far away to hear what Mary was saying.
We've been seeing each other for a few months now.
This part of the city was built on reclaimed land.
I have to hurry. Otherwise, I might miss my train.
Tom is unlikely to forget to tell Mary to do that.
Tom must've forgotten that he'd already done that.
Tom thinks Mary will probably not want to do that.
